TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ActivityScheduledQuery extends System.Activities.Tracking.TrackingQuery

Docs.summary: When added to the <xref:System.Activities.Tracking.TrackingProfile.Queries%2A> collection, subscribes to activity scheduled records when the tracking profile is created to subscribe to tracking records.
